name: Elena Petelos - PerMed
membership: HTAi, EARMA, ISPOR, iHEA, EUPHA, WIIS, FPH, RSM, RSPH, ECCO, ASCO, ESMO, and various working groups and special interest groups thereof
goal:
Overarching:
To contribute towards the improvement of public health and welfare, particularly through knowledge transfer and interdisciplinary research and collaboration.

Scope
To actively participate in healthcare research, research development and capacity-building activities, and to consult stakeholders across a wide spectrum on how to identify best available research evidence.

To promote the systematic use of the best available research evidence for policy-making, research agenda development, healthcare delivery, dissemination of results, risk assessment.

To promote impact maximisation through uptake of European project results and best practices by Member-States adapted at their respective national and local levels.

To identify mechanisms that maximise knowledge transfer and contribute to the development of evidence-based health-related policies.

To actively participate in knowledge and policy platforms, initiatives, and networks, to best support the overarching goals.
interests: Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
